issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.customfield_12310192: contrib/vaidya/bin/vaidya.sh script fixed to use appropriate jars and classpath

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: contrib/vaidya
components.description: Hadoop-Vaidya is a rule based performance diagnostic tool for MapReduce jobs

fields.description: Vaidya script is broken due to change in the naming convention for hadoop core jar and vaidya jar.
fields.summary: Change the name format for hadoop core and vaidya jar to be hadoop-{core/vaidya}-{version}.jar in vaidya.sh

comments.body: Patch added to fix the contrib/vaidya/bin/vaidya.sh script to use appropriate jars and classpath

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12496343/MAPREDUCE-3081.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    -1 patch.  The patch command could not apply the patch.
